code: const BASE_URL="http://13.51.11.25:8080/api/timetable";export const fetchCourses=async()=>{const res=await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/course`);return res.json();};export const addCourse=async course=>{await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/courses`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(course)});};export const fetchTimeSlots=async()=>{const res=await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/timeslot`);return res.json();};
